description: A talented couple run this modern, intimate restaurant with a wine-bar right in the town centre. Fish takes pride of place on the menu, with the catch of the day announced at your table, including delicious shellfish. The female owner oversees the extensive wine list, which features reasonably priced and mostly Tuscan labels.
